title: Smart cast
body: I played a few games a while ago and I noticed that my smart cast was acting weird. Rather than using an ability on button cast it would show a range indicator and then cast after I let go of the button. This is super annoying and I can't play properly with this so I had to resort to playing normal casting. I'm wondering if this is a new thing riot implemented or if my client is bugged?

replies.body:
Hey Summoner!

What you're encountering is called _quick cast with indicator_.

If you want to change back to normal quick cast then scroll to the bottom of the hotkeys tab, and uncheck the box saying _"Replace Quick Cast with Quick Cast with Indicator in the quickbind UI"_.
Fairly certain that there is an option to make the smart cast be on release like you describe, try looking underneath the settings for a checkbox about it perhaps.

Go into settings, Hotkeys, Scroll right down and untick "Replace Quick Cast with Quick Cast with indicator in the quickbind UI"

This will remove the indicator and make it cast on press.
